Sept. 17, 1995 D Burtonwood Brewery Brass Band Championships (Second Section)
Burtonwood Brewery Brass Band Championships (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Burtonwood Brewery Brass Band Championships burtonwood-brewery-brass-band-championsh-4759
None
Queen's Hall, Widnes, Cheshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £500 and trophy, 2nd £300 and trophy, 3rd £200 and trophy. Result of prizewinners as in British Bandsman, draw and entries as listed in programme kept at Brass Band Archive Wigan. Hollingworth not listed in programme and no draw for Todmorden, (2 bands shown as draw no 1 and 4) Can anyone assist to verify correct result.
March 23, 2015, 2:29 p.m. June 18, 2015, 11:27 a.m.
